author: Alex Davies
title: The High-Stakes Race to Build More Ventilators
description: The US is short of ventilators to help Covid-19 patients breathe. Ford, GM, and satellite-launch company Virgin Orbit are trying to fill the gap.
content: As he loaded the 3D printer into the back of his Jeep, Kevin Zagorski figured he wouldnt be back in his office for a while. It was Friday night March 20, and Virgin Orbit, the satellite launch company that spun out of Richard BransonsVirgin Galactic a few yea… [+4501 chars]
